INDICATOR_NAME: PPP conversion factor, GDP (LCU per international $)
SOURCE_NOTE: Purchasing power parity (PPP) conversion factor is a spatial price deflator and currency converter that controls for price level differences between countries, thereby allowing volume comparisons of gross domestic product (GDP) and its expenditure components. This conversion factor is for GDP.
SOURCE_ORGANIZATION: International Comparison Program, World Bank | World Development Indicators database, World Bank | Eurostat-OECD PPP Programme.
